body.name: SAMSUNG 27" T35F Series FHD 1080p Computer Monitor, 75Hz, IPS Panel, HDMI, VGA (D-Sub), 3-Sided Border-Less, FreeSync, LF27T350FHNXZA

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 40 mins
features: ALL-EXPANSIVE VIEW: The 3-sided borderless display brings a clean and modern aesthetic to any working environment. In a multi-monitor setup, the displays line up seamlessly for a virtually gapless view without distractions.Aspect ratio:16:9.Response time:5.0 milliseconds

IPS PANEL: Sit anywhere and have a full technicolor experience. The IPS panel preserves color vividness and clarity across every inch of the screen. Even on a display this wide, tones and shades look completely accurate from virtually any angle, with no color washing

SYNCHRONIZED ACTION: Superfluid entertainment experience. AMD Radeon FreeSync keeps your monitor and graphics card refresh rate in sync to reduce image tearing. Watch movies and play games without any interruptions. Even fast scenes look seamless and smooth

SEAMLESS, SMOOTH VISUALS: Now, the picture looks flawless. The 75Hz refresh rate delivers more fluid scenes. Whether you're catching up on your favorite TV drama, watching a video, or playing a game, your entertainment has no lag or ghosting effect

MORE GAMING POWER: Ideal game settings instantly give you the edge. Get optimal color and image contrast to see scenes more vividly and spot enemies hiding in the dark. Game Mode adjusts any game to fill your screen with every detail in view
body.description: Seamless screen with 3-sided border-less display stretches from edge to edge for immersive viewing and maximum concentration. With refined dark blue gray exterior, the screen brings more sleek and modern look.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Borderless Design All-expansive view Minimalist design, maximum concentration. The 3-sided borderless display brings a clean and modern aesthetic to any working environment. In a multi-monitor setup, the displays line up seamlessly for a virtually gapless view without distractions.

IPS Panel See it from any angle Sit anywhere and have a full technicolor experience. The IPS panel preserves color vividness and clarity across every inch of the screen. Even on a display this wide, tones and shades look completely accurate from virtually any angle, with no color washing.

AMD FreeSync Synchronized action Superfluid entertainment experience. AMD Radeon FreeSync keeps your monitor and graphics card refresh rate in sync to reduce image tearing. Watch movies and play games without any interruptions. Even fast scenes look seamless and smooth.

75Hz Refresh Rate Seamless, smooth visuals Now, the picture looks flawless. The 75Hz refresh rate delivers more fluid scenes. Whether you're catching up on your favorite TV drama, watching a video, or playing a game, your entertainment has no lag or ghosting effect.

Game Mode More gaming power Ideal game settings instantly give you the edge. Get optimal color and image contrast to see scenes more vividly and spot enemies hiding in the dark. Game Mode adjusts any game to fill your screen with every detail in view.

Eye Saver Mode Superior eye care Protect your eyes and do more. The advanced eye comfort technology reduces eye strain for less strenuous extended computing. Flicker Free technology continuously removes tiring and irritating screen flicker, while Eye Saver Mode minimizes emitted blue light. Your eyes stay fresh longer.

Dual Connection Ports True versatility Connect to more. With both HDMI and D-sub ports, multiple devices can be plugged straight into your monitor for complete flexibility. Now, your computing environment is even more convenient with additional input possibilities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for casual video and general use
reviews.reviewText: I mainly use my 13" MacBook Pro for music production, programming, and then some general web browsing, writing, and real casual general computer work. I'm not a gamer so I don't need 120Hz refresh rates. All I needed was something that would be easy on my eyes, look good in my space, and have a nice crisp display.This monitor is simple to set up. It's got 3 screws. You can move it side to side but there's only 20 degrees of vertical movement. That's fine if you want to look at your monitor head-on or angled slightly up at you but if you need something that tilts downward you'll have to get a VESA mount that either clamps to your desk or mounts to your wall.22 inches is plenty big with an HD screen and just what I needed when in a dual or triple monitor situation (occasionally I use my work-provided monitor in a 3 monitor setup).For music production it doesn't strain your eyes to be staring at it for hours on end. Same when you're programming. Any monitor will give you eye strain eventually but this one is not going to give most people any issues most of the time.You have options for HDMI or VGA connections. In my case I had to use a VGA cable for my work monitor in the past so I got an adapter for my laptop for USB-C to VGA connections. This works fine and the quality is the same as HDMI with this particular monitor because VGA quality goes up to around a thousand more pixels than 1080p and supports a refresh rate of 85Hz (assuming you didn't get a cheap cable). This monitor has a 75Hz refresh rate so using a VGA connection is not going to reduce quality. In fact I suspect that they chose HDMI and VGA precisely because the monitor works within the VGA spec and HDMI is just a very common connector these days so they included both while excluding DisplayPort because that's mainly used for higher spec machines and people shopping for a budget monitor likely wouldn't have a DisplayPort compatible computer. Plus DP is not super common anyway outside of offices and expensive computers and has little practical benefits over HDMI to the average person right now.But don't let the fact that this is a budget monitor fool you. If you know you need higher refresh rates because you'll be watching movies and gaming then sure, this isn't for you. If you know you're going to be doing work, browsing the web, watching YouTube videos, coding, doing regular boring average computer stuff, then this is going to be more than enough for you. This is the monitor that should be the default standard for everyone looking for an external laptop monitor or that would come with any PC bundle. I wouldn't want lower quality and most wouldn't even notice higher specs if it had them. It's in the perfect spot.If you need an excellent monitor that isn't a thousand dollar gaming monitor that's basically a flat screen TV made for the Super Bowl then this will be as good as any other.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After ordering the 1st monitor, it was without a doubt another one was needed for our home office. My wife and I love the displays on these monitors very crisp and colorful. Easy to attach to our dual monitor stand and looks great, having the ability to adjust the brightness (blue light feature) is a little upsetting in that the quality (picture still looks incredible) of the display is amazing! Very thin and seamless, lightweight which has left us very pleased with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth it
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this to upgrade my work from home set up about a month and half ago and so incredibly worth it. I mostly am writing and reviewing documents and sheets so I can’t compare specific technical features or how it is while gaming. Generally, it was super easy to set up and works really well in a small desk space but added a great second screen. The thing I was worried about from other reviews was turning it off. It was about a day or two learning curve to just understand how to tap the center of the button and click down easily to turn the monitor off at the end of the day but it also helped me get used to find and navigate the rest of the settings. I would say if you are looking for a second screen to expand your workstation that works reliably each day go for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good But Don't Look Like Samsung Product!
reviews.reviewText: We all know Samsung is the king so I didn't think twice before buying this monitor. Three factors that i have considered - Packaging, Physical Appearance and Display quality.I must say packaging and display quality were five star but the physical appearance was disappointing. The material of the body doesn't feel like its a Samsung product. Low quality plastic body, no locking system for the stand (we need screws to lock them), medium quality HDMI and power cable. Though after assembling the stand and the monitor, it feels sturdy. But I still believe the material used in the body and the way to assemble the monior could get better.Otherwise, it is definitely a great monitor!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great HD Monitor
reviews.reviewText: I get tired of bringing a monitor from my main home to my winter place so I bought this HD Samsung just to leave here over the summer. It is easy to set up, has a great screen and the HD version is fine for what I do here with photography and videography. Like all my monitors it did need to be calibrated. Just works well and fits in with my system at the remote location.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up
reviews.reviewText: So happy with this monitor. It’s the perfect size and the resolution is very crisp. Well packaged and came with all the accessories needed to set it up. Took me maybe 15 minutes. One tip I have is the screws for the monitor come in a small bag that was taped to the styrofoam packaging. I thought they were missing at first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Monitor-Hardware Information Provided
reviews.reviewText: The monitor works very well and is exactly what I was looking for. I experienced a bit of frustration when the package arrived and it was missing the hardware. Other reviews claimed they found it in a very small and hidden locations but after tearing the whole box apart it was still missing. After doing extensive research, I found screws from a hardware store that fit perfectly. If you’re missing your hardware to attach the base to the screen, try using M4-0.7 mm x 10 mm flat head Phillips.
Este monitor esta excelente en cuanto a relación calidad precio, excelente tamaño, excelente resolución (SAMSUNG nunca falla).

reviews.reviewTitle: Samsung siempre siendo la mejor opción
reviews.reviewText: La verdad es que esta es la segunda vez que compro un monitor de este tipo y nunca decepcióna, la mejor opción

reviews.reviewTitle: Minimalistic aesthetic, excellent standard HD 1080p screen.
reviews.reviewText: Although the design is now a few years old, this monitor is definitely worthwhile to consider for a new second display, or upgrade from an older display, maybe best suited to pair two as an affordable dual-monitor setup. Ideal workstation monitor for a office laptop. Good looking color quality, sharp and vivid, at nearly any viewing angle. No software installation required (optional download).OSD implementation is highly intuitive, no need to memorize buttons: Samsung's control input uses a pointing stick discreetly placed on the backside; completely replaces all buttons, very precise and easy to navigate. For example, Eye Saver Mode toggles with a click, push to the right, then click again; or click, push up, enter Menu>>Picture & scroll down.Experiment with settings, a few simple adjustments to the default configuration can tailor to your needs. Out of box, I thought the screen gamma appears darker than I want: I found switching black level from low to normal fixed it (assuming your input signal from PC is Full RGB). Enable FreeSync if you have AMD Radeon graphics. Enabling Dynamic Contrast automatically tunes (including brightness) according to whatever you are currently viewing, which works well for general purposes; when needed, activating Cinema or Game Mode should be useful for specific consistency.The panel is thin and lightweight: minimal bezel width on three sides makes this great for a multi-monitor desktop display, but even if used solo it's far far better attached to a fully adjustable table VESA mounting stand; its plastic stand is merely adequate. Non-glare matte screen looks great too but holds onto fingerprints and tends to be harder to clean. The included HDMI_1.4 cable is short; so is the power cord that leads into a small adapter box that will sit somewhere on your desk (or hanging off the side); there's not much excess cables to deal with. Basically you have a high quality 27" IPS monitor, limited by a modest 1080p 75Hz refresh rate, and only 1 VGA + 1 HDMI ports.

Excelente monitor, no podría recomendarlo para gaming puesto que la respuesta de frecuencia no es alta, pero lo recomiendo para trabajos de producción en donde se necesite una calibración adecuada de los colores.El diseño es elegante y delgado, tiene un aspecto profesional...Yo lo recomiendo para creadores de contenido o trabajos con programas de edición de fotografías y video, dadas las dimensiones es ideal para este tipo de trabajo y te permite calibrar los colores de forma "plana"
